name: Spicy Pulled Pork
keywords: Spicy Pulled Pork, pulled pork recipe, slow cooker pork, Dutch oven pork, Mexican cuisine, spicy pork, pork shoulder recipe, pork scotch roast, slow-cooked pork, shredded pork, main course, dinner, easy recipe, comfort food, taco filling, burrito filling, pork and spices, tomato-based sauce, tender pork, juicy pork, party food, meal prep, cumin, cayenne, cinnamon pork
description: A flavorful and tender Spicy Pulled Pork, slow-cooked to perfection with a rich blend of aromatic spices, tomatoes, onion, and leek. This versatile Mexican-inspired dish is perfect for filling tacos and burritos, or serving alongside rice.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot or dutch oven brown the pork on all sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Brown pork

recipeInstructions.text: Add everyone to the vessel and slow cook for about 4h or until it falls apart.
recipeInstructions.name: Slow cook

recipeInstructions.text: Fish out any chunks of cinnamon and cloves. Reduce the sauce, season to taste and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce

notes: I like to reserve a bit of sauce and then fry the meat. Once you get crispy bits then serve. When serving, add some extra sauce for juice.
Really great with fresh lime served with rice, in a burrito or in tacos. Very versatile.
